entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'Harry'. He is trying to get out of his room and access his trunk.

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of Harry's twin brothers. He is helping Harry by picking the lock on the cupboard under the stairs.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: The other twin brother of George and Harry. He is also helping Harry by providing a distraction while George picks the lock.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is mentioned as someone to hand things out to.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school that Harry attends. His 'Hogwarts stuff' is being locked away in the cupboard under the stairs.

relationships.description: George is helping Harry by picking the lock on the cupboard under the stairs.
Fred is also helping Harry by providing a distraction while George picks the lock.
George is assisting Harry in getting out of his room and accessing his trunk.
